biography: Michał Lorenc (born 5 October 1955 in Warszawa) is one of Poland's leading film score composers, best known for his work on Bastard (Polish: Bandyta). Since his debut in 1979, he has composed music for more than 150 feature films, documentaries, TV-serials and theatre performances. He won five Golden Lions, Polish Film Festival Awards, for best movie score.
name: Michał Lorenc
